channel.title: When will the Ledger Live application support the Radix Ledger App?
channel.description: The Radix Ledger App is now available to install on the Ledger Nano X and Ledger Nano S using the Ledger Live application with Developer Mode enabled.

item.title: When will the Ledger Live application support the Radix Ledger App?
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
The Radix Ledger App is now available to install on the Ledger Nano X and Ledger Nano S using the Ledger Live application with Developer Mode enabled.

Read full topic
item.source: When will the Ledger Live application support the Radix Ledger App?
